detail_desc: Short, sleeveless romper suit in woven fabric with elastication at the top, narrow shoulder straps, press-studs at the crotch and elasticated hems with a frill trim.
Mesh trainers with imitation leather details, glittery sections, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) and rubber soles.
Hairbands in soft cotton jersey with a sewn-on bow at the front.
Hairbands in soft cotton jersey with a sewn-on bow at the front.
Mesh trainers with a padded edge and tongue, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) and rubber soles.
Mesh trainers with a padded edge and tongue, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) and rubber soles.

Fitted, quilted, lightweight jacket with a small stand-up collar, zip down the front and front pockets. Filling 80% down and 20% feathers. Supplied with a practical storage bag with an elasticated drawstring. Size of bag 11x24.5 cm.
Cardigan in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with a round neckline, buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Fine-knit tights with an elasticated waist.
Fine-knit tights with an elasticated waist.

All-in-one suit in patterned sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Small, ribbed stand-up collar, a zip down the front, fake front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hems. Soft brushed inside.

All-in-one suit in patterned sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Small, ribbed stand-up collar, a zip down the front, fake front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hems. Soft brushed inside.
Dungaree shorts in a soft cotton weave with press studs at the sides and adjustable straps with a press-stud at the front. Fake front pockets, a real back pocket and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of dungarees in soft cotton. Top in jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder. Dungarees in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with adjustable straps that fasten at the front, elastication at the back of the waist, a printed kangaroo pocket with appliqués, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of dungarees in soft cotton. Top in jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder. Dungarees in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with adjustable straps that fasten at the front, elastication at the back of the waist, a printed kangaroo pocket with appliqués, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Jacket in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a motif, a jersey-lined hood with appliqués at the top, a zip down the front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jacket in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a motif, a jersey-lined hood with appliqués at the top, a zip down the front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft cotton jersey with a print motif or pattern. Lapped shoulders and press-studs at the crotch.
No-show socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elastication around the tops. The socks are designed to be hidden inside your shoes.

Trainers in imitation leather and mesh with glittery sections, a lightly padded edge and tongue and lacing at the front. Jersey linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of trousers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric. Top with a print motif and ears on the front, a press-stud on one shoulder and sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs. Trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of trousers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric. Top with a print motif and ears on the front, a press-stud on one shoulder and sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs. Trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Long-sleeved tops in cotton jersey with buttons on one shoulder, a chest pocket and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Short-sleeved top in fast-drying functional fabric with a hood with a concealed drawstring that tightens to the back. Zipped chest pocket with a reflective detail, short raglan sleeves, slits at the hem and reflective details on the front and sleeves. Slightly longer at the back.

Pyjamas in a patterned cotton weave. Shirt with a collar, buttons down the front, yoke with a pleat at the back, short, wide sleeves, and short slits in the sides. Short shorts with an elasticated waist, button fly and side pockets.

Padded mittens in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with decorative appliqués and a print at the top. Narrow, elasticated seam at the top and wrists, and a plastic hook-and-eye fastener to keep the mittens together. Thinsulate™ lining.

All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey, one in pointelle. Press-studs down the front and along one leg, a small satin bow at the front, short sleeves and short legs. Picot trim around the neckline, sleeves and hem.
